'''Shrimp''' is a character in {{poe2}}.
__NOTOC__

## Background

A member of an RDC junk crew, Shrimp is currently busy celebrating a string of victories at sea, thanks to the coin given to him and the rest of the crew by the captain. They've been emptying Vailian wine casks and loudly singing Rauataian anthems - or approximations thereof - ever since.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Bigger Fish](/aBiggerFish/)
|none            = 
|other           = * Shrimp mentions seeing you walk out of [Hadret House](/hadretHouse/) in the chaos following the Duc's assasination (in {{poe1}})
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Bigger Fish](/aBiggerFish/): He's part of the crew Martino wants out of the district.

## Trivia

* Voiced by voice actor [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0448611/?ref_=ttfc_fc_cl_t56 Peter Kenny], whom also is the voice actor of the Witcher series audiobooks.
[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)

__NOTOC__
==Background==
A member of an RDC junk crew, Shrimp is currently busy celebrating a string of victories at sea, thanks to the coin given to him and the rest of the crew by the captain. They've been emptying Vailian wine casks and loudly singing Rauataian anthems - or approximations thereof - ever since.
